1.title: Fools For Christ
1.plot: Malachi claims that he is no ones fool, but Naomi and the other Superbook kids show him that it is okay to be a fool for Christ.

2.title: Village Life- Part 2
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: We All Want Grace
3.plot: Mia and Mariah answer a viewer question about showing grace to bad people.

4.title: Village Life- Part 3
4.plot: Malachi, Quinn and Alitheia explore The World of Jesus of Nazareth exhibit at the Museum of the Bible. In part three, Malachi and Alitheia learn about the Torah and synagogue from Paul.

5.title: Who's My Neighbor?
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Love Your Enemies
6.plot: Alex is finding it hard to love his enemy Mr. Mathis. Miriam uses the example of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr to show how to love others.

7.title: Conquering Fear
7.plot: Naomi is afraid to take a leadership position at school, so Josie helps encourage Naomi to face her fears.

8.title: God is Everywhere
8.plot: Quinn and Alitheia explore the Impact of the Bible in the World exhibit at the Museum of the Bible.

9.title: Poor Spirit; Rich Life
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Left Out
10.plot: Joel and Kaitlin answer a question from a viewer about what to do when you feel left out in church.

11.title: Quiz Show: Miracles of Jesus
11.plot: Josie and Dylan test their knowledge on the Superbook episode Miracles of Jesus during a quiz competition hosted by Jessica.

12.title: World Translations
12.plot: Quinn and Malachi are at the Museum of the Bible talking about taking the Bible to all the world. We also hear from kids from all over the world saying John 3:16 in their own languages.

13.title: Valentine
13.plot: Morgan shares the story of saint Valentine and encourages viewers to be a Valentine.

14.title: Love Languages
14.plot: Mia and Abby talk about the five main ways people receive love: physical touch, quality time, gifts, words of affirmation and acts of service.

15.title: Faithful
15.plot: Quinn and Lawrence share testimonies from Superbook kids all around the world that show God's faithfulness to us.

1.title: Pride
1.plot: Based on the Superbook adventure "In the Beginning," Josh and Miriam discuss why pride is not a good thing.

2.title: Guess that Christmas Carols #1
2.plot: Host Mariah gives clues and historical background to our Guess the Christmas Carol - "O Little Town of Bethlehem." Rebekah and Morgan then sing the carol.

3.title: Names of God
3.plot: Our hosts Miriam and Joel are joined by the full Superbook Show cast as they share about God's love and many names.

4.title: Guess that Christmas Carol #2
4.plot: Hosts Mariah and Kaitlin give clues and historical background to our Guess the Christmas Carol - "O Holy Night." Rebekah and Morgan then sing the carol.

5.title: Guess that Christmas Carol #3
5.plot: Host Kaitlin gives clues and historical background to our Guess the Christmas Carol - "Joy to the World." Rebekah and Morgan then sing the carol.

6.title: O Holy Night
6.plot: Host Kaitlin introduces Rebekah and Morgan singing a full version of "O Holy Night."

7.title: Joy to the World
7.plot: Host Mia introduces The Superbook Dancers and their take on Joy to the World.

8.title: Bizarre Bible Byte: Stille Nacht
8.plot: Jessica tells the strange story of how "Silent Night" kicked off the World War I Christmas truce (December 1914).

1.title: Superbook Word: Lord
1.plot: Mia and Joel discuss what it means to say "Jesus is Lord." Gizmo makes a special appearance.

2.title: Shout Aloud
2.plot: Dylan introduces The Superbook Dancers and their video for Shout Aloud.

3.title: Keeping It Real: Deception
3.plot: Is it okay to lie? Dylan and Jessica answer a viewer's question about telling the truth.

4.title: Prejudice
4.plot: How do you treat others who are different from you? Miriam and Emma discuss this tricky issue.

5.title: Bizarre Bible Byte: Birthright for Stew
5.plot: What was the dumbest deal in history? Emma says it was Esau trading his birthright to Jacob.

6.title: World's Worst Bible Riddles
6.plot: Our hosts bring you the worst Bible riddles in history.

7.title: Youth
7.plot: Chandler and Mariah discover that no one is too young to take part in God's Kingdom.

8.title: Prayer Hacks: The 3 Point Prayer
8.plot: Joel and Miriam reveal a simple hack to make your prayer life more fun.

9.title: Keeping It Real: Second Chances
9.plot: Emma and Joel learn that everyone deserves a second chance.

10.title: New Testament Bible Hack
10.plot: Mariah teaches Jessica a great way to memorize the books of the Bible.

11.title: Jokes, Jokes, Jokes
11.plot: Our hosts band together to present some very lame jokes.

12.title: He Has a Plan
12.plot: Joel introduces the Superbook Dancers and their take on He Has a Plan.

13.title: Illustrated: 1 Corinthians 13
13.plot: What is God's idea of Love? Emma and Miriam read from a very loving passage in the Bible.

14.title: Superbook Word: Sacrifice
14.plot: Emma and Miriam learn the meaning of true sacrifice, and kick off the sacrifice challenge.

15.title: Gizmo's Bible Brain Busters!
15.plot: Josh and Miriam compete in the Superbook Bible App's Bible Brainbuster game.

16.title: The Bible's Stubbornest Messenger
16.plot: Joel explores the story of one of G-d's oddest messengers: Balaam's donkey.

17.title: Word: Wrestling
17.plot: Jessica and Chandler arm wrestle while learning what it means to wrestle with G-d. Gizmo makes a special appearance.

18.title: Send in Your Questions!
18.plot: Jessica and Kaitlin ask for questions, while Kaitlin has a question of her own.

19.title: Good Humor/Bad Humor
19.plot: Mariah and Kaitlin explore the idea of Godly humor.

20.title: Music Video: Holy Holy Holy
20.plot: Josh introduces the Superbook Dancers and their take on Holy Holy Holy.

21.title: People's Names
21.plot: Miriam and Mia discuss the importance of names in the Bible. The whole team jumps in to give the meanings of their names.

22.title: Seder: The Story of Passover
22.plot: Miriam, Joel and Emma help retell the Passover story as they participate in a Messianic Passover Seder.

23.title: Sacrifice Challenge Update
23.plot: Miriam and Emma let us know how they are doing with the sacrifice challenge.

24.title: Saint Patrick
24.plot: Jessica sets Kaitlin straight with facts on Saint Patrick.

25.title: Real Prayer
25.plot: Joel and Miriam tackle praying in front of other people.

26.title: Where Do You Pray?
26.plot: Mariah wonders where people like to go to pray - and the team answers.

27.title: Messianic Seder Highlights
27.plot: Miriam, Joel and Emma share highlights from a Messianic Passover Seder.

28.title: Messianic Seder Dinner
28.plot: Miriam, Joel and Emma experience a Messianic Seder dinner.

29.title: The Salvation Poem
29.plot: Jessica introduces The Salvation Poem, as performed by the Superbook Dancers.

30.title: Bizarre Bible Byte: The Road Runner Gag
30.plot: Chandler explains how the Bible and Looney Tunes have more in common than you think.

31.title: Superbook Studio Tour Part 1
31.plot: MollyJean talks with John Schafer about the process of animating Superbook.

32.title: Answers - Part 1
32.plot: Miriam and Joel tackle audience questions, including the real date for Christmas.

33.title: Superbook Studio Tour Part 2
33.plot: MollyJean looks behind the scenes of Superbook, speaking with the animators.

34.title: Answers - Part 2
34.plot: Miriam and Joel answer more questions, and the team gives their impersonations of Chris and Joy.

35.title: Superbook Studio Tour Part 3
35.plot: MollyJean concludes her tour of the Superbook Animation Offices.

36.title: Endless Adventure Music Video
36.plot: Mariah introduces the Endless Adventure, as presented by the Superbook Dancers.

37.title: Repentance
37.plot: Emma shows Josh an illustration for how Jesus takes sins away.

38.title: Jesus in the Boat
38.plot: Miriam counsels Dylan on perspective in trials - remember that Jesus is in the boat.

39.title: White Jesus?
39.plot: Mariah and Jessica take on the question of how Jesus appears in artworks.

40.title: The Salvation Poem - Spanish
40.plot: Jessica introduces The Salvation Poem, as performed by the Superbook Dancers.

41.title: Celebrate Your Victory Music Video
41.plot: Joel talks about dance, and then introduces the Superbook Dancers and Celebrate Your Victory.

42.title: What Brings Us Together
42.plot: Mariah and Chandler discuss the things that make us unique, and what connects us.

43.title: Pillar of Salt
43.plot: Kaitlin walks us through one of the most bizarre punishments in the Bible.

44.title: Angel of Light
44.plot: Mia uses Medusa and Lucifer to show us that you can't always judge a package by its good looks.

45.title: Keeping It Real: Coincidence
45.plot: Jessica encourages Mariah as she faces changes at school.

46.title: Light App
46.plot: Mia helps Emma understand how God's wisdom helps us make decisions.

47.title: Count It All Joy
47.plot: Joel encourages Mariah to find joy in all circumstances.

48.title: Giant Adventure Quiz
48.plot: Josh quizzes Jessica and Emma on a game show devoted to "A Giant Adventure."

49.title: Watch What You Watch
49.plot: Mariah refers to Jacob in showing Kailtin the importance of watching what you watch.

50.title: Joshua Fought the Battle of Jericho
50.plot: Miriam introduces the Superbook Dancers and their take of the fall of Jericho.

51.title: Do the Right Thing
51.plot: Mia helps Dylan understand how to "want" to do the right thing.

52.title: Cookies
52.plot: Alitheia teaches Lawrence a lesson on judging from outward appearances using a plate of cookies.

53.title: Jesus is Rooting for You
53.plot: Morgan and AJ find encouragement in tough situations, remembering that God is rooting for us.

54.title: Be Light
54.plot: Alex encourages Quinn to be a light in all circumstances.

55.title: O, Brother
55.plot: Miriam and Mia explore the odd sibling relationships in the Bible.

56.title: You Are the One
56.plot: Kaitlin introduces the Superbook Dancers as they remind us that Jesus is the one while dancing in a library.

57.title: Christian (Yankee Doodle)
57.plot: Josie takes a look at insults that have become compliments like the words "Christian" and "Yankee Doodle".

58.title: Agree With God
58.plot: Naomi and Mariah talk about the importance of agreeing with what God says about you and your situation.

59.title: Obedience
59.plot: Malachi and John talk about how to show love to and honor our parents by being obedient.

60.title: Answers Part 3
60.plot: Kaitlin and Josh answer viewers questions.

61.title: Temptation
61.plot: Josh and Miriam talk about how to overcome temptation and do the right thing.

62.title: Lord of Everything
62.plot: Jessica introduces the Superbook Dancers as they worship God for being Lord of Everything.

63.title: Prayer Connection- Fun Version
63.plot: Joel and Mariah do an experiment to show us how a relationship with Jesus connects our prayers to Him.

64.title: Science and Religion
64.plot: Elizabeth and Alitheia talk about how science and religion are not really opposed to each other and look at how God is revealed in creation.

65.title: Superbook Sundays in August- Watch Naaman & Elisha!
65.plot: Miriam and Alex invite our viewers to watch new Superbook episodes every Sunday in August. Join Alex and Miriam as they watch Naaman and the Servant Girl and Elisha and the Syrians.

66.title: Superbook August MiniThon!
66.plot: Kaitlin and Josh encourage viewers to tune in every Sunday in August to see new Superbook episodes.

67.title: God is Greater than Your Feelings
67.plot: Malachi and Kaitlin talk about what you do when you don't feel "okay" with God.

68.title: Stand Up Egg
68.plot: Miriam and Emma do an experiment to demonstrate how God gives you strength to stand up to peer pressure.

69.title: August 5th MiniThon- Naaman & Elisha (Available for 24 Hours!)
69.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

70.title: Superbook Sundays in August- Watch Lazarus and Elijah! August 12th, 3PM E.S.T.
70.plot: Morgan and Quinn invite our viewers to watch new Superbook episodes every Sunday in August. Join Quinn and Morgan as they watch Elijah and the Widow and Lazarus.

71.title: The Whole Truth
71.plot: Kaitlin and MollyJean answer a viewer's question "is not telling the whole truth considered lying?"

72.title: We Won't Stop
72.plot: Lawrence introduces the Superbook Dancers as they go to the trees and take to the skies to show that with Christ we can do anything.

73.title: The Superbook Show MiniThon- Elijah & Lazarus (Video Begins 30 Seconds In!)
73.plot: Quinn and Morgan watch Elijah and the Widow and Lazarus. Only available for 24 hours.

74.title: August MiniThon: Peter's Denial and Escape! August 19th
74.plot: Joel and Malachi invite our viewers to watch new Superbook episodes every Sunday in August. Join Joel and Malachi as they watch Peter's Denial and Peter's Escape.

75.title: Don't Overthink It
75.plot: Josie and Morgan show us that opportunities to serve the Lord and others are right before our eyes.

76.title: Wonderfully Made
76.plot: Jessica and her fellow Superbook Show hosts share what makes them unique and encourage viewers to remember they are fearfully and wonderfully made.

77.title: Superbook MiniThon: Peter's Denial and Escape! - August 19th, 3PM E.S.T.
77.plot: Joel and Malachi watch Peter's Denial and Peter's Escape. Only available for 24 hours.

78.title: August Minithon: Call of Samuel and Jesus Heals the Blind- August 26th, 3PM
78.plot: Alitheia and Emma invite our viewers to watch new Superbook episodes every Sunday in August. Join Emma and Alitheia as they watch Samuel and the Call of God and Jesus Heals the Blind.

79.title: Perfectionism
79.plot: Kaitlin confesses that she is a perfectionist. Mariah reminds her that Jesus loves us even though we are not perfect.

80.title: Prayer Dancer
80.plot: Miriam and Joel explain how there are many ways to pray, and Joel demonstrates how dance can be prayer.

81.title: Superbook MiniThon: Samuel & Jesus- Available until 6PM E.S.T.!
81.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

82.title: ATM Fish
82.plot: Dylan shares a bizarre story from the Bible about Peter paying the temple tax with coins from the mouth of a fish.

83.title: Sitting Shiva
83.plot: Alex and Naomi talk about how we can help a grieving friend through the Jewish custom of "sitting shiva".

84.title: OutTakes
84.plot: The Superbook Show kids show our viewers just how silly we really are by sharing outtakes from previous episodes.

85.title: One Holy Church
85.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

86.title: Talents
86.plot: Alitheia and Miriam explain how our "super" gifts and talents come from God and should be used for the service of others.

87.title: Honor
87.plot: Mariah and Quinn share how to honor your parents even when you don't agree with them.

88.title: Faith Fuel
88.plot: Lawrence and Elizabeth give examples of people from the Bible who were people of faith and people of action.

89.title: Labels
89.plot: Jessica and John explain how negative labels for things (or people) affect how we think about them. Then, they encourage the viewers to use positive labels instead of negative ones.

90.title: Follow Jesus
90.plot: Naomi and the Superbook dancers remind us how to take a step back when life gets crazy and remember the basics: follow Jesus.

91.title: You Don't Say
91.plot: Alitheia and Malachi are at the Museum of the Bible in Washington DC where they share common phrases we use every day that originated in the Bible.

92.title: Saint Francis
92.plot: Quinn and Elizabeth tell the story of Francis and his love of animals.

93.title: Food Delivery
93.plot: Miriam shares a bizarre story from the Bible about Elijah being fed by ravens while he was in the wilderness.

94.title: Pets
94.plot: The Superbook Show kids introduce the pets that God has blessed them with.

95.title: Slave Bible
95.plot: Alitheia is at the Museum of the Bible in Washington DC where she shares the story of a Bible that was created by slave owners for slaves.

96.title: Bible App Walk-Through
96.plot: Jessica explains how to navigate through the Bible on the Superbook Bible App.

97.title: Jealousy
97.plot: Chandler is jealous of Joel's new video game. Emma helps the two friends by teaching them how to be happy for each other instead.

98.title: What Will People Think
98.plot: Morgan has to pray in the school assembly and is afraid what people will think, but Naomi encourages Morgan to be herself.

99.title: Halloween
99.plot: Emma and Alex have a discussion about the history of Halloween and how Christians might approach it.

100.title: Trust In The Lord
100.plot: Lawrence feels his life is over when his family moves across town. Mariah encourages him to trust in the Lord.

101.title: The World's A Stage
101.plot: Quinn and Malachi are at the World Stage theater in the Museum of the Bible where they remind us that we all have a time to shine.

102.title: The Importance of Being Excellent
102.plot: Mia was late to the show again, so Elizabeth reminds her we are to do all things to the glory of God.

103.title: To Do Or Not To Do
103.plot: Emma and John answer a question from a parent and discuss what we should do rather than what we shouldn't do.

104.title: Push Past Your Feelings
104.plot: Kaitlin and Josh are being lazy and don't feel like hosting the show. MollyJean appears and tells them that sometimes we need to push past our feelings and do the things we should do.

105.title: Give Thanks
105.plot: Dylan, Josie and Jessica share passages from the Bible about thankfulness.

106.title: Thanksgiving
106.plot: MollyJean and Lawrence share the facts about the history of Thanksgiving.

107.title: Gutenberg Press
107.plot: Alitheia and Quinn are at the Museum of the Bible where they learn about the Gutenberg printing press and print a page of the Bible.

108.title: The UnMerit System
108.plot: John does not feel that he earned a science fair award given to his team, but Alex reminds him that God blesses us with unmerited favor and love all the time, so John should celebrate the award.

109.title: What God Wants
109.plot: AJ and the Superbook dancers remind us to do what God wants even when it is difficult.

110.title: Persistence
110.plot: When Lawrence keeps bugging Mia to play her video game, Mia teaches him the difference between being persistent about our own will vs God's will.

111.title: Courageous Pages
111.plot: Malachi, Quinn and Alitheia explore the children's exhibit at the Museum of the Bible and play all of the games they have there.

112.title: Make Good Plans
112.plot: Malachi wants to get revenge on a boy at school, but Morgan reminds him how God really wants us to treat our enemies.

113.title: Christmas Misses
113.plot: AJ and Miriam share how some things we assume about the first Christmas were not actually in the Bible.

114.title: International Salvation Poem
114.plot: Josie introduces a music video of the Salvation Poem being sung in languages from around the globe.

115.title: Christmas Tree
115.plot: Malachi and Kaitlin share the history of the Christmas tree.

116.title: Everything Good
116.plot: Jessica introduces a music video and shares how her "joy list" helps her remember all the good things God has done.

117.title: Village Life- Part 1
117.plot: Malachi, Quinn and Alitheia explore The World of Jesus of Nazareth exhibit at the Museum of the Bible. In part one, Quinn and Alitheia explore home life with Rebecca.

locations: CBN Broadcast Center - 977 Centerville Turnpike, Virginia Beach, Virginia, USA::(studio)
imdb.title: The Superbook Show
plot: _The Superbook Show_ (qv) is a web-series for kids covering all things Superbook, including re-enactments of animation segments, thoughtful Biblical teachings, and a look behind the scenes.
